Package com.example.luckydragon.Views

Class Observer

java.lang.Object
com.example.luckydragon.Views.Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddEventView, EntrantEventsView, EventView, OrganizerProfileView, ProfileView, SelectRoleView, SignupView, ViewEventsView, ViewProfilesView
public abstract class Observer extends Object
Abstract class where Observers keep track of changes in the Observable.
